title: The Message of Christmas, the Geek Version
body: This is the season where we all get inundated with all the different versions of Christmas. It's hard to avoid feeling jaded and cynical about it all. Years ago I ran into a book called The Evolution of Cooperation by Robert Axelrod. It's a wonderful book. In a strong sense, it's the geek version of the message of Christmas. It's a very readable Game Theory book that contains a profound message of hope: cooperation is the optimal strategy, not conflict. Check it out at amazon, or better yet, support your local bookstore.
